markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Xulgath Demon-Caller](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2018)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Xulgath Demon-Caller](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2018)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 26</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spiked gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 80

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature entering the aura must attempt a DC 22 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and on a critical failure, the creature also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all [xulgaths'](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102) stench for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_spiked gauntlet_ +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d4+4 piercing plus demonic condemnation

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +15,
**Damage** 2d8+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +12 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 24, attack +16
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45) (×2), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **2nd**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306) (×2)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

**Cleric Domain Spells 1 Focus Point,** DC 24
- **3rd**
[Athletic Rush](/Spells.aspx?ID=402)

**Demonic Condemnation**   The target must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 4 on a critical failure). The target is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for as long as it is frightened.

</column>
name: Xulgath Demon-Caller
